programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: James Cameron's science-fiction action thriller sequel to The Terminator, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Linda Hamilton. Tormented by the imminent threat of a nuclear holocaust from which intelligent machines will emerge to crush the last vestiges of human existence, Sarah Connor has been institutionalised and separated from her son. Informed of the future, she knows that young John Connor will survive and become leader of the human race. However, the machines of 2029 know it too, and once again they send a cyborg assassin back through time to terminate the potential saviour James Cameron - Director, James Cameron - Director Arnold Schwarzenegger - The Terminator Linda Hamilton - Sarah Connor Edward Furlong - John Connor Robert Patrick - T-1000 Earl Boen - Dr Silberman Joe Morton - Miles Dyson S Epatha Merkerson - Tarissa Dyson Castulo Guerra - Enrique Salceda Xander Berkeley - Todd Voight Jenette Goldstein - Janelle Voight Danny Cooksey - Tim Michael Biehn - Kyle Reese Arnold Schwarzenegger - The Terminator Linda Hamilton - Sarah Connor Edward Furlong - John Connor Robert Patrick - T-1000 Earl Boen - Dr Silberman Joe Morton - Miles Dyson S Epatha Merkerson - Tarissa Dyson Castulo Guerra - Enrique Salceda Xander Berkeley - Todd Voight Jenette Goldstein - Janelle Voight Danny Cooksey - Tim Michael Biehn - Kyle Reese.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Blockbuster fantasy adventure starring Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey and Kate Bosworth. Superman returns to Metropolis after a five-year mission to look for his home planet Krypton, only to find that his former sweetheart Lois Lane has a new boyfriend and a young son. programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. programme.title: The Cinema List: Bourne
programme.desc: Twenty years after The Bourne Identity first reached our screens, explore the brilliant characterisation, camerawork, car chases and more that make this franchise iconic.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1993 ║ PG
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's blockbuster adventure, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum and Richard Attenborough. Billionaire tycoon John Hammond has built the ultimate theme park - an island populated by genetically engineered dinosaurs. A group of guests, including Hammond's grandchildren, are invited to preview the attraction, touring the park in remotely controlled cars. But, as a tropical storm gathers, an unscrupulous employee shuts down the elaborate security system, leaving the tour stranded - and mayhem about to break loose Steven Spielberg - Director, Steven Spielberg - Director Sam Neill - Dr Alan Grant Laura Dern - Dr Ellie Sattler Jeff Goldblum - Ian Malcolm Richard Attenborough - John Hammond Bob Peck - Robert Muldoon Martin Ferrero - Donald Gennaro BD Wong - Dr Wu Joseph Mazzello - Tim Ariana Richards - Lex Samuel L Jackson - Arnold Wayne Knight - Nedry Jerry Molen - Harding Sam Neill - Dr Alan Grant Laura Dern - Dr Ellie Sattler Jeff Goldblum - Ian Malcolm Richard Attenborough - John Hammond Bob Peck - Robert Muldoon Martin Ferrero - Donald Gennaro BD Wong - Dr Wu Joseph Mazzello - Tim Ariana Richards - Lex Samuel L Jackson - Arnold Wayne Knight - Nedry Jerry Molen - Harding.

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: Period action drama, starring Tom Cruise. In 1876, after witnessing the US military brutality against native Americans, Captain Nathan Algren turns to drink to escape his battle nightmares. Hired by the young Japanese emperor to train the country's first modern, conscript army, Algren is forced to lead an inadequate campaign against the ancient line of Japanese warriors, the Samurai. But when he is captured by these alleged national enemies, he begins to doubt his mission Edward Zwick - Director, Edward Zwick - Director Tom Cruise - Captain Nathan Algren Timothy Spall - Simon Graham Billy Connolly - Sergeant Zebulon Gant Tony Goldwyn - Colonel Benjamin Bagley Ken Watanabe - Katsumoto Hiroyuki Sanada - Ujio Koyuki - Taka Shichinosuke Nakamura - Emperor Meiji Shun Sugata - Nakao Seizo Fukumoto - Silent Samurai Masato Harada - Omura Shin Koyamada - Nobutada William Atherton - Winchester Rep Togo Igawa - General Hasegawa Tom Cruise - Captain Nathan Algren Timothy Spall - Simon Graham Billy Connolly - Sergeant Zebulon Gant Tony Goldwyn - Colonel Benjamin Bagley Ken Watanabe - Katsumoto Hiroyuki Sanada - Ujio Koyuki - Taka Shichinosuke Nakamura - Emperor Meiji Shun Sugata - Nakao Seizo Fukumoto - Silent Samurai Masato Harada - Omura Shin Koyamada - Nobutada William Atherton - Winchester Rep Togo Igawa - General Hasegawa.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Crime/detective, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2022 ║ U
programme.desc: Young Gru attends an interview to join a diabolical dream team christened the Vicious 6, but Belle Bottom, Jean-Clawed, Nun-chuck, Svengeance and Stronghold cruelly dismiss the boy. programme.title: The Cinema List: True Stories

programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: Romantic period adventure starring Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman. When the network announces it will move his failing kid's science programme to a late-night slot, it's clear that his glory days are over. Then a series of extraordinary events lead to Cameron building a rocket in his garage in an attempt to make his dreams come true. programme.desc: Period horror based on the classic Oscar Wilde tale, starring Colin Firth and Ben Barnes. It falls to a young boy to try and restore harmony M Night Shyamalan - Director, M Night Shyamalan - Director Noah Ringer - Aang Jackson Rathbone - Sokka Dev Patel - Prince Zuko Nicola Peltz - Katara Cliff Curtis - Fire Lord Ozai Shaun Toub - Uncle Iroh Aasif Mandvi - Commander Zhao Seychelle Gabriel - Princess Yue Noah Ringer - Aang Jackson Rathbone - Sokka Dev Patel - Prince Zuko Nicola Peltz - Katara Cliff Curtis - Fire Lord Ozai Shaun Toub - Uncle Iroh Aasif Mandvi - Commander Zhao Seychelle Gabriel - Princess Yue.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan
programme.desc: From 80s hit Police Story to 2010 blockbuster The Karate Kid, discover some of the most iconic films in Jackie Chan's prolific career. And remember, don't try this at home.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Documentary And Factual, Arts And Culture, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. programme.title: The Cinema List: Revenge
programme.desc: Some films are best served cold, so wrap up and join us as we dive into our favourite revenge movies - from new hits to Oscar-winning classics. We hope you're ready for action.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan
programme.desc: From 80s hit Police Story to 2010 blockbuster The Karate Kid, discover some of the most iconic films in Jackie Chan's prolific career. And remember, don't try this at home.

programme.title: The Hand of Death (Subbed)
programme.desc: A survivor of an attack on a rebel group opposing the Manchu invasion of China creates a new fighting technique and seeks revenge. Jackie Chan stars. (1976)(90 mins).

programme.title: Project A
programme.desc: An honest marine cadet takes it upon himself to preserve his country's honour as he sets out to battle smugglers and pirates. Jackie Chan stars. (1983)(106 mins).

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan
programme.desc: From 80s hit Police Story to 2010 blockbuster The Karate Kid, discover some of the most iconic films in Jackie Chan's prolific career. And remember, don't try this at home!

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman must protect a female witness from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work. Jackie Chan and Brigitte Lin star. (1985)(89 mins).

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: Kevin Chan is demoted from detective to traffic cop just as Hong Kong is hit by a wave of bomb scares. Jackie Chan stars. (1988)(90 mins).

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday
programme.desc: Out to beat the top assassins in the world, protect the ungrateful son of a mafia boss and save his only friend, the Accident Man is back. Action-comedy sequel. (2022)(94 mins).

programme.title: The Big Boss (1971)
programme.desc: Sworn to a sacred oath, a man investigates his cousin's disappearance. Action starring Bruce Lee, in Cantonese with subtitles. (1971)(96 mins).

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China (Subbed)
programme.desc: A man must protect his martial-arts school while sorting out his feelings for a young woman who is his aunt by adoption. Jet Li and Biao Yuen star. (1991)(95 mins).

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China
programme.desc: A martial arts teacher protects his students and his aunt from a mercenary. Jet Li and Rosamund Kwan star. (1998)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: Jason Statham stings the enemy in a brutal hunt for vengeance, which escalates after he is revealed to be part of a powerful organisation. Action-packed Sky Original film. (2024)(101 mins).

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Five assassins, all on a fast-moving train, find out their missions have something in common. Action thriller with Brad Pitt and Joey King. (2022)(126 mins).

programme.title: Oldboy (2003)
programme.desc: Park Chan-wook's neo-noir classic. When a man is released from a 15-year kidnapping ordeal, he becomes entangled in a conspiracy. Subtitled. (2003)(102 mins).

programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: Adman Josh Brolin is held in captivity for 20 years. On release, can he track down the man who put him there? Mystery thriller. Strong language/violence/sex/mature themes. (2013)(101 mins).

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman must protect a female witness from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work. Jackie Chan and Brigitte Lin star. (1985)(89 mins).

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: Kevin Chan is demoted from detective to traffic cop just as Hong Kong is hit by a wave of bomb scares. Jackie Chan stars. (1988)(90 mins).

programme.title: Police Story 3 Super Cop
programme.desc: Police inspector Jackie Chan teams up with undercover agent Michelle Yeaoh to bring down a cartel from the inside. (1992)(91 mins).

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: A young mystic must learn to control the elements to save his kingdom from a destructive war. Action-packed adaptation of the hit animation. Moderate violence. (2010)(99 mins).

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China (Subbed)

programme.desc: A martial arts teacher protects his students and his aunt from a mercenary. Jet Li and Rosamund Kwan star. (1998)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan
programme.desc: From 80s hit Police Story to 2010 blockbuster The Karate Kid, discover some of the most iconic films in Jackie Chan's prolific career. And remember, don't try this at home!

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: Michelle Yeoh stars in her breakout role as a Hong Kong police officer who forms an alliance with a flight security agent to foil a hijacking. (1986)(93 mins).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Nearly 5,000 years after being bestowed with the almighty powers, Black Adam arrives to unleash justice on the world. (2022)(124 mins).

programme.title: Dragon Lord (Subbed)
programme.desc: The adventures of a restless martial arts student called Dragon, who gets involved with a gang of thieves. Jackie Chan stars. (1982)(94 mins).

programme.title: Zu: Warriors From The Magic...
programme.desc: A young soldier, monks and a priest seek celestial swords that will help protect an immortal from threatening evil. (1983)(94 mins).

programme.title: The Young Master (Subbed)
programme.desc: A kung-fu fighter is mistaken for a fugitive while searching for his runaway brother. Jackie Chan stars. (1980)(93 mins).

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious
programme.desc: Tyre-squealing action as a cop goes undercover to infiltrate Vin Diesel's street racing gang. With Michelle Rodriguez and the late Paul Walker. (2001)(108 mins).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Nearly 5,000 years after being bestowed with the almighty powers, Black Adam arrives to unleash justice on the world. (2022)(124 mins).

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: A hitman comes out of retirement when a gang of thugs kill his beloved dog. Stylish revenge thriller starring Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist and Willem Dafoe. (2014)(98 mins).

programme.title: Project A
programme.desc: An honest marine cadet takes it upon himself to preserve his country's honour as he sets out to battle smugglers and pirates. Jackie Chan stars. (1983)(106 mins).

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: This Movie has won many awards for the different categories like Highest Grossing Debut Actress, Rising Film Star From Television, Best Male Playback Singer.

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: The lives of three childhood friends, SK, Lalita and Sundar, take a shocking turn after Sundar's printing press receives an extremely inflated electricity bill. Starring Shahid Kapoor.

programme.title: Yeh Saali Aashiqui
programme.desc: Sahil and Mittee fall in love at college, but their dreamy romance soon turns into a dark and twisted tale of vengeance following an appalling incident.

programme.title: Ravanasura
programme.desc: Ravindra, An inept junior lawyer at a law firm, agrees to help a business magnate clear her father's name of murder. However, when bodies start piling up, Ravindra begins to show his true colours.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including 'Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment' at the National Film Awards, India 1995.

programme.title: Jersey
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhit) A cricketer who quits cricket decides to revive his career at the age of 36 for his sons dream and prove his ability.

programme.title: Uunchai
programme.desc: Three retired friends go on a trek to the Everest Base Camp to fulfill their dying friend's last wish. What starts as an adventure soon turns into a personal journey of emotional enlightenment.

programme.title: I Killed Bapu
programme.desc: The assassination of Mahatma Gandhi made Nathuram Godse one of the most hated assassins in the history of India. The film depicts Godse's reason behind the extreme step.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Tere Naam
programme.desc: Himesh Reshammiya won the 'Best Music Director' award at the Zee Cine Awards 2004 and Screen Awards 2004. Bhoomika Chawla won the 'Best Debut Actress' at the Best Debut Actress.

programme.title: Dil Dhadakne Do
programme.desc: Anil Kapoor and Shefali Shah won 'Best Supporting Role' award at the Stardust Awards 2016. Ranveer Singh won 'Most Entertaining Actor' at the Big Star Entertainment Awards 2015.

programme.title: Pareeksha
programme.desc: Adil Hussain got the Best Actor in a Digital Film in IWM Digital Awards.

programme.title: Secret Superstar
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards including, 'Best Actress in a Supporting Role - Meher Vij, Best Playback Singer - Female - Meghna Mishra, Best Actress - Zaira Wasim'.

programme.title: Kartik Calling Kartik
programme.desc: A much-abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.

programme.title: Mission Raniganj: The Great Bharat Rescue
programme.desc: A 2023 Indian Hindi-language disaster thriller. Mining engineer Jaswant Singh Gill leads a challenging rescue mission to save 65 miners trapped in a flooded coal mine.

programme.title: Dil Chahta Hai
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards in many categories like 'Best actor, Best Comic Award, Best Film, Best Director, Best story, Best Lyrics, Best Singer'.

programme.title: Laadla
programme.desc: (1994) A film about Raju who is forced to marry a rich mill owner's arrogant daughter for the sake of his disabled mum. Will the marriage sustain despite all the odds?

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Raanjhanaa
programme.desc: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

programme.title: Chaalbaaz
programme.desc: Sridevi was declared best actress and Saroj Khan was declared best choreographer at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: Sirf Tum
programme.desc: A 1999 love story about Deepak (Sanjay Kapoor) and Aarti (Priya Gill) who fall in love without seeing each other. Neha (Sushmita Sen) who also loves Deepak provides the third angle.

programme.title: Shahenshah
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan as Shahenshah seeks to wipe out evil at night, while he parades as a corrupt cop during the day. Meenakshi Sheshadri plays his lady love.

programme.title: Paying Guests
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Four young boys (Shreyas Talpade, Javed Jaffrey, Ashish Chowdhary, Chunky Pandey) go to unimaginable extent to be kept as paying guests by their landlord! A 2009 comedy film.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: The commando, Karanveer Singh Dogra, is approached to chase and catch an Indian criminal gang, who pose a threat to India itself.

programme.title: Tarla
programme.desc: The journey of India's iconic home chef, Tarla Dalal. It captures the integral role she played in empowering women and helping them realise their dreams through food.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Vardi
programme.desc: Constable Bhagwan killed by Lalchand, gangster. Years later, Bhagwan's son Ajay, along with his father's close associate Inspector, tries to nab Lalchand and bring him to justice.

programme.title: Kites
programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Arjun
programme.desc: Arjun after his graduation thrives to get job. The corruption and injustice taking place in his community frustrates him to the extent of revolting with the help of some of his.1985.

programme.title: Prem
programme.desc: (1995) A film about reincarnation in which Sanjay (Sanjay Kapoor) has visions of his past life, but when he sees Sonia (Tabu) he is convinced that they were lovers. Will Sonia be convinced?

programme.title: Khiladi 786
programme.desc: Ashish R. Mohan won the 'Favorite Debut Director' at the Lions Gold Awards 2013.

programme.title: Tamasha
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Irshad Kamil won the 'Best Lyrics' award at the Filmfare Awards 2016. A. R. Rahman won the 'Best Music Director' award at the IBN Live Movie Awards 2016.

programme.title: Happy Bhaag Jaayegi
programme.desc: Happy, a vibrant Indian girl, elopes on the day of her wedding so that she can marry Guddu, the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Jaan
programme.desc: Police Commissioner Suryadev Singh appoints Karan as Kajal's bodyguard as she is facing danger from Vishamber. But the truth is, Karan is Vishamber's man who is sent to kill Kajal.

programme.title: Jaan
programme.desc: Police Commissioner Suryadev Singh appoints Karan as Kajal's bodyguard as she is facing danger from Vishamber. But the truth is, Karan is Vishamber's man who is sent to kill Kajal.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Main Tera Hero
programme.desc: Varun Dhawan won the best actor in comic role for the movie.

programme.title: Gupt
programme.desc: Kajol won 'Best Performance by an Actor in a Negative Role', Rajiv Rai won 'Best Editing and Viju Shah won 'Best Background Score' award at the Filmfare Awards 1998.

programme.title: Chamku
programme.desc: (2008) A traumatised child becomes a Naxalite and upon being captured must agree to become a police assassin. Starring Bobby Deol and Priyanka Chopra.

programme.title: Sanam
programme.desc: (1997) Gaurav is deprived of love from his family. After his elder brother Narendra dies in an accident, Gaurav attempts to fill-in for him and joins the army to make his father proud.

programme.title: Zero
programme.desc: This movie won many awards for different different categories like Best Actor, Best Supproting Actor, Best Visual Effect.

programme.title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Arijit Singh won the 'Best Singer - Male' award, Pritam Chakraborty won the 'Best Music Director' award, Irshad Kamil won the 'Best Lyricist' award at the Mirchi Music Awards'18.

programme.title: NH10
programme.desc: The film won many awards like 'Most Entertaining Film' at the Big Star Entertainment Awards 2015. Darshan Kumar won an award for his negative role at the Stardust Awards 2016.

programme.title: Trishul
programme.desc: The film was declared a 'Super Hit' at the box office, becoming the second-top-grossing Indian film of 1978.

programme.title: Hathkadi
programme.desc: ACP Suraj, an honest policeman, swears revenge on culprits when his innocent brother is killed. However, he is soon accused of murder and is remanded to prison.

programme.title: Prem
programme.desc: (1995) A film about reincarnation in which Sanjay (Sanjay Kapoor) has visions of his past life, but when he sees Sonia (Tabu) he is convinced that they were lovers. Will Sonia be convinced?

programme.title: Angaaray
programme.desc: (1998) Inspector Amar, who was convicted for attacking a man with a knife in his childhood, is ordered by the Police Commissioner, Vinod Talwar, to find the murderer of a businessman, Khanna.

programme.title: Trimurti
programme.desc: (1965) A drama about two brothers. The eldest brother is a good man while the second one has gone astray. Fate compels the youngest brother, Romi (Shahrukh Khan), to choose between good and bad.

programme.title: Dor
programme.desc: Ayesha Takia won the 'Best Actress' award at the Screen Awards 2007 and Zee Cine Awards 2007. Shreyas Talpade won the 'Best Comic Actor' award at the Screen Awards 2007.

programme.title: Dhadak
programme.desc: (Movie@6) Ishaan Khattar and Janhvi Kapoor won the 'Best Debut Actor/Actress award, Ajay Gogavale, Atul Gogavale won the 'Best Music' award at the Zee Cine Awards 2019.

programme.title: Darlings
programme.desc: This is block buster movie of the year 2022 won many awards like Best Film, Best Story writing, Best Actress and many more.

programme.title: Beyond The Clouds
programme.desc: Ishaan Khattar won the 'Best Debut Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 2019 and Bosphorus Film Festival 2017.

programme.title: Gulaab Gang
programme.desc: Juhi Chawla won the 'Best Supporting Actress' award at the IBN Live Movie Awards 2015.

programme.title: Goodbye
programme.desc: Rashmika Mandanna won award for Best Debut Actress and Breakthrough Performance of the Year.

programme.title: Hijack
programme.desc: (2008) Drama. The saga of a father (Shiney Ahuja) as he battles terrorists on a flight in which his daughter Priya (Ishita Chauhan) is travelling. Kunal Shivdasani directs this thriller.

programme.title: Bamfaad
programme.desc: A passionate love story set in Allahabad between Naate and Neelam who meet accidentally and fall in love. They make brave choices and go through a path of love and loss to be with each other.

programme.title: Baazi
programme.desc: A tough and honest police officer wages a one-man war against terrorists and a corrupt politician who have planned to assassinate the chief minister of the state.

programme.title: Hatya
programme.desc: (1988) (Movie @6) When Sagar finds a boy on the street, he brings him home and treats him well. He soon finds that the boy's mother has been killed and that he has become the prime suspect.

programme.title: 420 IPC
programme.desc: Ca Keswani is arrested for bank fraud and forgery. Keswani hires Birbal, a lawyer, to fight his case, but Birbal realises that there's more to it than meets the eye.

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Literary icon Ernest Hemingway begins a romance with war correspondent Martha Gellhorn in this true-life romantic tale. With Nicole Kidman and Clive Owen. (2012)(155 mins).

programme.title: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Winston Churchill faces a battle against Nazi tyranny while also overcoming obstacles in his marriage to Clementine. Historic drama starring Albert Finney. (2002)(96 mins).

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker Luke Treadaway has a life-changing moment when a tabby moggy walks into his life. British comedy-drama based on real-life events. With Anthony Head. (2016)(98 mins).

programme.title: Into The Storm (2009)
programme.desc: A gripping look at how Winston Churchill led Britain in a battle against Nazi aggression from 1940 to 1945. Starring Brendan Gleeson. (2009)(95 mins).

programme.title: Path To War
programme.desc: Sir Michael Gambon stars as Lyndon B Johnson as he and his foreign-policy team debate the decision to withdraw from or escalate the war in Vietnam. Biographical drama. (2002)(127 mins).

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor, Orlando Bloom and Josh Hartnett fight to survive during a Somalian war. Strong language/violence/mature themes/flashing images. (2001)(139 mins).

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle. Epic adventure with Tom Cruise. Contains violent scenes. (2003)(148 mins).

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Colin Firth is the monarch who must overcome his stammer, in the fabulous multi Oscar-winning smash. Geoffrey Rush, Guy Pearce and Helena Bonham Carter co-star. (2011)(114 mins).

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Literary icon Ernest Hemingway begins a romance with war correspondent Martha Gellhorn in this true-life romantic tale. With Nicole Kidman and Clive Owen. (2012)(155 mins).

programme.title: Gia
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie gives a Golden Globe-winning performance as tragic model Gia Marie Carangi, depicting her lavish life and untimely death. (1998)(120 mins).

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly...
programme.desc: Sky Cinema original exploring the crimes of Ted Bundy (Zac Efron) from the perspective of his girlfriend Elizabeth Kloepfer. Strong language/violence/sex/mature themes. (2019)(108 mins).

programme.title: And The Band Played On
programme.desc: Witness the discovery of the AIDS epidemic and the infighting of the scientific community hampering the early fight against it. Contains distressing scenes. (1993)(136 mins).

programme.desc: Homeless busker Luke Treadaway has a life-changing moment when a tabby moggy walks into his life. British comedy-drama based on real-life events. With Anthony Head. (2016)(98 mins).
